recipes.name: Egg fried rice
recipes.ingredients:
3, Medium Eggs
1, Red onion

1/3 cup, Raw Brown Rice
6 tsps, Sunflower Oil
3 small spoons, Whole Jeeru
3 small spoons, Rai
2 cubes, garlic ginger paste
Chilli powder to taste
1/2 small spoon, Haldi
1.5 small spoons, Dhana Jeeru
1 small spoon, Garam Masala
Light soy sauce to taste
Sesame seeds to taste

# 1/2 Red / Green pepper
# 4 Spring Onions
recipes.method:
Wash and cook the brown rice.
While the rice is cooking, roast the whole jeeru on the pan and set aside.
Add 5 tsps of oil to the pan.
Once warm, add diced onions and allow them to sauté.
Add rai and roasted jeeru.
When the rai starts to pop, add the garlic ginger paste.
Once slightly brown, push this to the side of the pan and add 1 tsp of oil to the empty side.
Once warm, add all the spices and allow them to fry slightly.
Mix contents of the pan together.
Whisk the eggs and add, allow them to scramble.
Split the eggs into small chunks.
(Optional) Add the pepper and spring onions and allow to soften slightly.
Add the rice with light soy sauce to taste.
Garnish with sesame seeds to taste.

recipes.name: Crispy Tofu
recipes.ingredients:
Super firm tofu
Soy sauce to taste
Chilli sauce
Aamli sauce
Paprika
Cornstarch
Sesame oil
recipes.method:
Press tofu with a paper towel above and below to get the water out
Cut tofu into chunks
Add soy sauce, chilli sauce, aamli sauce and paprika to a large bowl and stir
Add tofu and mix
Marinate for at least 1 hour
Add to another bowl 2.5 tbsps soy sauce, 2.5 tbsps cornstarch and 2 tbsps sesame oil and mix
Coat the tofu in the second mix
Air fry for 10 minutes at 200°C, turning halfway through

recipes.name: Cheese Toastie
recipes.ingredients:

recipes.name: Fried Rice
recipes.ingredients: 1/2 lb. beef, 1 small green pepper, 1 small can mushrooms or 1/2 can bamboo shoots, 1 Tbsp. soy sauce, 1 medium onion, 1 stalk celery, 2 carrots, 2 or 3 eggs, 1 garlic bud, salt, pepper and Accent to taste

recipes.name: Chinese Fried Rice
recipes.ingredients: 1 c. rice, 3 Tbsp. salad oil, 1/2 to 1 c. chopped ham, 1 fried egg, chopped, small green onion, soy sauce to taste (not too much), salt to taste

recommendations.ingredients: For the rice, 3 cups water, 1 chicken bouillon cube, 3 small bay leaves, 1 tablespoon oriental sesame oil, salt, to taste, 1 1/2 cups converted rice, For the egg sheets, 2 large eggs, 2 egg whites, salt, to taste, 1 tablespoon oil, Putting it all together, 3 tablespoons vegetable oil, 4 garlic cloves, minced, 1 tablespoon gingerroot, minced, 1 onion, chopped, 1 green bell pepper, cut into 1-inch pieces, 2 carrots, thinly sliced, 1/2 lb shiitake mushroom, wiped clean, trimmed and sliced, salt (to taste), 4 stalks celery, thickly sliced, 3 cups coarsely chopped green cabbage, 1 tablespoon garam masala, 1/4 - 1/3 cup szechuan sauce (or to taste), 1 (8 ounce) can bamboo shoots, drained, 1 (8 ounce) can water chestnuts, drained, 1/2 cup water, 2 -3 teaspoons chili paste (or to taste), 2 -3 teaspoons oriental sesame oil (or to taste), 1/2 cup minced fresh cilantro (to taste)
